dmca.title: [AB-C103626O] Intellectual Property Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, July 09, 2006 9:12 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [AB-C103626O] Intellectual Property Infringement
Subject: [AB-C103626O] Intellectual Property Infringement


Reference: [AB-C103626O]

For your review. 

Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
I am writing in regards to a previous client that we hosted and
developed his web site - to this day he has not paid for our services -
none of the code or site design is his. All intellectual design
copyrights are owned by Universal Commercial Services, Inc., dba.
Glendale Designs. The site in question is cqbk9.com and we contacted
getstacked.com (the current host), but they informed us that that wasn't
their problem. 
 
  
 
We did find out that getstacked.com acquires services from you and that
their customer sites are hosted on your collocation servers. We believe
that they are in violation of your AUP (Acceptable Use Policy) 
 
  
 
Customers may not transmit, distribute, download, copy, cache, host, or
otherwise store on a Server any information, data, material, or work
that infringes the intellectual property rights of others. The Planet
has the right to disable access to, or remove, infringing content to the
extent required under any law or regulation, including the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998. 
 
  
 
It is clear that cqbk9.com was developed by us (and we have further
prove if
needed) - they even left our byline/link (site by Glendale Designs) on
each page. Please advice as to what other information you need or how
you can assist us in taking down this site. It is clearly not CQBK9s to
use. The owner of CQBK9 is Alex Dunbar, residing in Colorado. 
 
  
 
Best regards, 
 
Sabine Sharp
President 
 
 <http://www.glendaledesigns.com/> Glendale Designs   
 
4331 W. Wagoner Rd. - Glendale, AZ 85308 
Phone: 623-322-6066     Fax: 623-322-3478     Email: 
<mailto:sabine@glendaledesigns.com> sabine@glendaledesigns.com
